item.title: Games for Programmers
item.description: Ever since I can remember I liked puzzles. My father had a book on puzzles, and there were also puzzle magazines. I liked it much I also liked gaming very much. I don’t remember where it started, but I played a lot. Well, today I’ll talk about games that have programming involved, albeit indirectly. Light-Bot This is a very simple game at first. It scales after some levels, but a programmer shouldn’t have much trouble completing it.
